title: Wild and Crazy Kids
author: verias
text:
Hidden Name: Crimson Rhem

So, Mandrake's managing to zip around and evade capture! Also, throwback time! Anyone remember the pneumatic tubes from Chapter 1?

Wonder where she's going? Maybe to find help!

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: "...and laying a finger beside her nose, and giving a smirk, up the tube she rose..."

replies.author: Graham*Guest*
replies.text: The itsy bitsy fairy went up the water spout...

replies.author: Daikun*Guest*
replies.text: If only he had a can of Raid handy...

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: She's probably headed for the garage, hopefully the tube isn't locked at the other end.
